start.name: The Beginning
start.description: You stand in a void of potential. Anything can happen here.
start.image_prompt: A swirling void of colors and shapes, representing potential.

forest_clearing.name: Forest Clearing
forest_clearing.description: A small clearing surrounded by ancient trees. The air is thick with the scent of pine and earth. A narrow path winds deeper into the woods, disappearing around a bend where shadows seem to dance.
forest_clearing.image_prompt: A peaceful forest clearing with ancient trees surrounding a small open area, sunlight filtering through the canopy

The Beginning.name: The Beginning
The Beginning.description: You stand in a void of potential. Anything can happen here.
The Beginning.image_prompt: A vast empty void with swirling particles and floating possibilities

stone.name: Smooth Stone
stone.description: A small, perfectly round stone that feels warm to the touch. It seems to pulse with a faint inner light.

stick_001.name: Mystical Branch
stick_001.description: A slender, polished branch that seems to shimmer with otherworldly energy. It hums softly and changes color between silver and gold.

symbol_001.name: Mystic Symbol
symbol_001.description: A glowing symbol that seems to pulse with otherworldly energy
